Firstswim.name: Firstswim
Firstswim.description: Firstswim mobile & desktop application - to making it easy to browse data stored in the Fusepool platform.
Firstswim.author: Luca Szab�

AutoSuggest.name: AutoSuggest
AutoSuggest.description:
Autosuggest component.
Created by Adam Nagy, GeoX Kft.
AutoSuggest.author: �d�m Nagy

classitems.description:
The create function set the css classes, the contents and creates an entity
list into the dictionary.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function returns the list object.
classitems.name: getEntities

classitems.description:
After the user over the mouse an entity, the program gets the details about
the chosen entity, and this function is called for update the details box
with the details title and an address object.
classitems.name: updateDetails

classitems.description:
After the user hovers an entity, the program gets the details about
the chosen entity, and this function is called for update the details box.
classitems.name: displayDetails

params.name: rdf
params.description: rdf with the metadata of the entity

classitems.description: This function returns whether an entity is checked or not.
classitems.name: isCheckedEntity

params.name: entity
params.description: the entity what the function check

return.description: true, if it is checked, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user checks/unchecks an entity.
It handles the unchecked entity list and calls the parent filter function.
classitems.name: updateEntities

params.name: checked
params.description: the entity is checked or not

classitems.description:
When the component is created the program sets the title's properties and
hides it.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function hides the facet popup.
classitems.name: tapFacetList

classitems.description:
This function updates the dictionary list from a dictionary object. This
object contains a search word, a dictionary array and the previously unchecked
entities.
classitems.name: updateLists

classitems.description:
This function handles the actions that happen on mouseover event:
it sets the proper css classes and calls the detail displayer function of
the parent kind.
[replaced with function 'displayDetails']
classitems.name: updateDetails

classitems.description:
This function handles the actions that happen on mouseover event:
it sets the proper css classes and calls the detail displayer function of
the parent kind.
classitems.name: displayDetails

params.name: rdf
params.description: rdf with the metadata of the entity

classitems.description:
This function calls the parent's search function with search word and the
checked entity list.
classitems.name: filter

params.name: checked
params.description: the entity was checked or unchecked

classitems.description:
This function looks up an entity object in the list of checked entities and
returns the array index.
classitems.name: indexOfEntity

return.description: the array index if the list contains the entity, -1 otherwise

classitems.description: This function updates the checked entity list.
classitems.name: updateCheckedDictionaries

classitems.description: This function updates the dictionary list.
classitems.name: updateDictionaryList

classitems.description: This function is called when the user clicks on the 'Open in new tab' menu item.
classitems.name: openInNewTab

classitems.description: This function hides the facet menu.
classitems.name: hideMenu

classitems.description:
This function is called on entity mouse over event.
It calls the 'getDetails' function if the user leaves the mouse over
the element for at least 400 milliseconds.
classitems.name: preDetails

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user hovers an entity element but immediately
leaves it, so the detail information should not be updated.
classitems.name: stopDetails

classitems.description: This function sends an ajax request to get detailed information about an entity.
classitems.name: getDetails

classitems.description: This function runs when the ajax request returned with the requested information.
classitems.name: processDetailsResponse

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user checks/unchecks a checkbox.
It calls the callParent function with the current state.
classitems.name: checkboxChange

classitems.description: This function is called when the user clicks on an entity.
classitems.name: entityClick

classitems.description:
This function calls the parent's search function with the clicked entity
and the new checkbox value.
classitems.name: callParent

classitems.description:
When the component is created, the program sets the title's properties and
hides it.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user activates/deactivates label prediction.
It sets the proper cookie value and calls the label prediction toggle
function of every 'shortDocument' children kinds.
classitems.name: toggleLabelPrediction

classitems.description: This function runs when the user activates/deactivates the rating bar.
classitems.name: activateChecking

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks the 'Process' button.
It collects the sufficient information (checked facets,
search word and ratings) and calls the function which actually 
sends a classify request using this classify object.
classitems.name: processClassify

classitems.description:
This function sends an ajax request to the server for classification
using a classify object.
classitems.name: sendClassifyRequest

params.name: classifyObject
params.description: the classify object containing every sufficient information

classitems.description:
This function runs when the classifying request returned a response.
It calls the classify response processor function of the parent kind.
classitems.name: processClassifyResponse

params.name: success
params.description: success status of the classification request

params.name: classifyResponse
params.description: the response of the classification request

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks the 'More' button.
It shows the loader, hides the 'More' button and sends and ajax
request with the new offset value.
classitems.name: moreBtnPress

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user fires a search. It clears the list
and shows the loader.
classitems.name: startLoading

classitems.description:
This function updates the document list using a document object. This
object contains the short documents.
classitems.name: updateList

classitems.description: This function shows a message in the document list box.
classitems.name: showMessage

params.name: message
params.description: the message what we want to show

classitems.description: This function updates the document counter.
classitems.name: updateCounts

classitems.description: This function adds more documents to the existing document list.
classitems.name: addMoreDocuments

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user opens a document to preview.
It calls a parent function, which calls the preview box to open it.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: inEvent
params.description: the mouse event (important in the desktop version)

classitems.description:
This function prepares an annotation about the activities related to the
document list: which documents the user got using which search query;
whether the user clicked on the documents. It also calls a parent function 
which actually sends the request to the server.
classitems.name: sendDocListAnnotation

params.name: click
params.description: is it only displayed or clicked

classitems.description:
This function updates the 'checkedNumber' text with the offset
and the checked numbers.
classitems.name: updateCheckedNumber

classitems.description: This function scrolls to the top of the document list.
classitems.name: scrollToTop

classitems.description:
This function increases the number of checked documents and updates the
checked number text.
classitems.name: addCheck

classitems.description:
This function decreases the number of checked documents and updates the
checked number text.
classitems.name: removeCheck

classitems.description:
This function shows/hides the process button based on the
current value of 'checkedDocs'.
classitems.name: showOrHideProcessButton

classitems.description:
When the component is created the program sets the content's properties and
binds the 'openDocEvent' event to the 'shortDoc' component.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: After rendering, the positive/negative slider is being initialized.
classitems.name: rendered

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user enables/disables
label prediction. It calls the toggle function of each
label lists'.
classitems.name: togglePredictedLabelLists

classitems.description: This function hides the document popup menu.
classitems.name: leaveMenu

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the
'Open in new tab' menu item.
classitems.name: openInNewTab

classitems.description:
This function runs on 'openDocEvent' events (ontap, ontouch, onenter, etc).
It calls the parent's function which opens the document in the preview.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: inSender
params.description: the component where the event is fired (shortDoc)

params.name: inEvent
params.description: the fired event (important in the desktop version)

classitems.description: This function runs when the user clicsk on the document icon.
classitems.name: tapIcon

classitems.description:
This function shows/hides the slider bar according to the
'activated' parameter
classitems.name: updateRatings

params.name: activated
params.description: display status of the slide bar

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user slides the bar.
It calls the parent addCheck or removeCheck function.
classitems.name: checking

classitems.description: This function calls the delete function of the parent's parent.
classitems.name: deleteLabel

classitems.description: This function calls the add function of the parent's parent.
classitems.name: addPredictedLabel

classitems.description: The create function sets the content of the label list based on the doc URI
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function is fired when the user selects a label
from user label list.
classitems.name: userLabelSelection

classitems.description:
This function calls the back-end for predicted and existing 
labels and initializes the lists based on the return value.
classitems.name: initLabels

classitems.description:
This function shows/hides the list of predicted labels
based on the 'enable' parameter.
classitems.name: togglePredictedLabelLists

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks on the 
'Add label' button. It displays the panel in which
users can add labels using the input field.
classitems.name: addMoreLabelsBtnPress

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks on the 
'Close' button. It hides the panel in which
users can add labels using the input field.
classitems.name: hideAddingPanelBtnPress

classitems.description:
This function handles key press events. On pressing 
'Enter' it adds the entered label. On pressing 'ESC'
it closes the panel.
classitems.name: onKeydown

classitems.description:
This function adds a label from the input field to the
list of existing labels.
classitems.name: addNewLabel

classitems.description: This function adds a predicted label to the list of existing labels.
classitems.name: addPredictedLabel

classitems.description: This function adds a user label to the list of existing labels.
classitems.name: addUserLabel

classitems.description:
This function deletes a label from the GUI and sends an annotation
to the server about it.
classitems.name: deleteLabel

classitems.description:
This function creates the proper annotation string
and fires the annotation sender function.
classitems.name: sendLabelListAnnotation

params.name: action
params.description: type of the click action (1 = accept; -1 = dismiss)

classitems.description:
When the component is created the program sets the title's properties and
hides the loader.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function runs, when the user starts a search.
Currently does nothing.
classitems.name: startLoading

classitems.description:
After the elements have been rendered, the Landscape
module is being initialized.
classitems.name: rendered

classitems.description:
When the component is created the program sets the title's properties and
hides the loader.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
When the component is created, the program sets the title's properties,
hides the loader and calls the function which handles resizing actions.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user starts a search. It clears the current 
content and shows the loader.
classitems.name: startLoading

classitems.description: This function returns default values for the graph.
classitems.name: getGraphDefaults

classitems.description: This function runs a search.
classitems.name: search

classitems.description: This function creates the document list from the rdf object.
classitems.name: createDocumentList

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf object, which contains the documents

classitems.description:
This function gets the documents and pushes them to the nodeObj
as child nodes, and calls the buildGraphJSON to continue building
the graph on the given branch.
classitems.name: addDocNodes

classitems.description:
This function builds an object recursively until it reaches the desired level. 
It's set to 3, the centre node is level 0. This object will be used to feed the 
graph. Important: The centre node must be initialized already before calling
this function.
classitems.name: buildGraphJSON

params.name: URI
params.description: an entity that filters the result. "query" means no filter (for centre node)

classitems.description:
After getting the subject children of a given document,
this function iterates through them and initializes the 
nodes in the graph after getting the label information.
classitems.name: createSubjNodes

params.name: nodeLimit
params.description: the node limit on the current level

classitems.description:
This function filters an rdf object and returns an array of URIs found in
dc:subject
classitems.name: getSubjectConnections

params.name: success
params.description: whether the search query was success or not

classitems.description:
After a new search term has been entered, the graph is being redrawn.
In case of the very first search, a completely new graph is being initialized.
classitems.name: newGraph

classitems.description: This function redraws the graph using the object in the graphJSON variable.
classitems.name: redrawGraph

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on a node.
It calls a parent function, which can call the preview box
to open a document.
classitems.name: onNodeClick

classitems.description:
This function clears the timeout that has been set 
for node hover.
classitems.name: onNodeLeave

classitems.description: This function sets a 1 sec timeout before displaying details.
classitems.name: onNodeHover

classitems.description: This functions shows a message in the network-graph panel
classitems.name: showMessage

classitems.description:
This function defines a function on window resize event which 
which calls the div resize handler function.
classitems.name: canvasResizer

classitems.description:
This function resizes the graph canvas to the proper size.
It should be called after any resize event happens.
classitems.name: onDivResize

classitems.description: The create function initializes the annotator panel.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function initializes the predicate list based
on the predicates array.
classitems.name: initPredicates

classitems.description:
This function sets the state of a predicate element
based on the given properties.
classitems.name: setPredicateState

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the 
dismiss icon on a predicate element. It fires the proper
functions.
classitems.name: dismissPredicate

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the 
accept icon on a predicate element. It fires the proper
functions.
classitems.name: acceptPredicate

classitems.description:
This function shows the annotator panel and hides the
'Customize predicates' button.
classitems.name: showPredicateAnnotator

classitems.description:
This function hides the annotator panel and shows the
'Customize predicates' button.
classitems.name: hidePredicateAnnotator

classitems.description:
This function creates the proper annotation string
and fires the annotation sender function.
classitems.name: sendPredicateAnnotation

params.name: predicateName
params.description: label of the clicked predicate element

params.name: action
params.description: type of the click action (1 = accept; -1 = dismiss)

classitems.description: When the component is created, the proper state and label is being set.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the
dismiss icon. It sets the visual state of the element 
and calls the proper function of the parent object 
which handles this action.
classitems.name: dismissPredicate

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the
accept icon. It sets the visual state of the element 
and calls the proper function of the parent object 
which handles this action.
classitems.name: acceptPredicate

classitems.description:
When this component is created, it overwrites the right click listener
because of the popup menu in the desktop version. It disables the default popup menu.
The content's and loader's properties are being set.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function is called when window size is changing and it should
modify the opened document's height too.
classitems.name: changeHeight

classitems.description: This function returns the selected text in the window.
classitems.name: getSelectedText

classitems.description:
This function clears the document's content and 
the predicate annotator.
classitems.name: clearAll

classitems.description:
This function is called after the main kind has loaded the 
meta-graph of the given document. It asks for predicate 
prediction, creates the predicate annotator panel and 
calls a function which processes the prediction result.
classitems.name: processDocGraph

classitems.description:
This function is responsible for sending the opened
document's graph to the visualizer. It gets an array of 
predicates and cuts the graph according to the status
(accepted: true/false) of this set.
classitems.name: filterGraph

classitems.description: This function clears the visualizer panel.
classitems.name: clearVisualization

classitems.description:
This function passes a given RDF store object to 
Uduvudu which displays the document.
classitems.name: showVisualization

classitems.description:
This function clears the document content, shows the loader and sends an
open doc request to a URL.
classitems.name: openDoc

classitems.description: This function scrolls the scrollbar to the top.
classitems.name: scrollToTop

classitems.description:
When the component is created this function sets the css classes of the button
and the popup.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user push the bookmark button. If the
parentTapFunction is not empty, it calls the parent's function, otherwise
calls the own saveBookmark function.
classitems.name: tapBookmarkButton

classitems.description:
This function save a bookmark with an URL and title if it is possible.
Otherwise show a warning popup with an opportunity to save the bookmark
manually. If any the parameters are empty, the function use the default
URL and title. If the URL doesn't start with the "http://" text, it concatenates
this text with the URL.
classitems.name: saveBookmark

classitems.description:
When this component is created it sets the properties of the 
scroller and the title.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function updates the content of the details.
classitems.name: displayDetails

params.name: rdf
params.description: rdf with the metadata of the entity

classitems.description: This function cleans the content.
classitems.name: clean

classitems.description: This function returns the country code from a URL.
classitems.name: getCountryCode

classitems.description: This function scrolls the scrollbar to the top.
classitems.name: scrollToTop

classitems.description:
When the component is created this function iterates through the menu items
and fires the addMenuItem function of them.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function creates an Enyo component using a menuItem object.
classitems.name: addMenuItem

params.name: menuItem
params.description: the object which contains data about a menu item

classitems.description: This function is called when the user clicks on a menu item.
classitems.name: tapMenu

classitems.description: This function returns a child element by index.
classitems.name: getChildrenById

classitems.description:
When this component is created this function set the button's,
the input's and the icon's properties.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function fires the updater function of the input field.
classitems.name: updateInput

classitems.description:
This function clears and hides the suggest list and fires the
search function of the parent.
classitems.name: search

classitems.description:
This function creates the whole user interface by
initializing necessary components and methods.
classitems.name: createUI

classitems.description:
When the component is being created it renders the
template for the document preview, and calling functions
that process cookie and GET parameters.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description:
After the rendering the program calculates and sets the
position of the bookmark popup and the size of the preview box.
classitems.name: rendered

classitems.description:
This function calls the 'initViewType' function which
sets the view type based on cookie values and calls the
'setCss' function too.
classitems.name: processCookieValues

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user selects a stylesheet.
It calls the 'setCss' function with the proper value.
classitems.name: selectCss

classitems.description:
This function changes the stylesheet behind the page and 
places a cookie.
classitems.name: setCss

classitems.description:
This function initializes the view type at the beginning
using the 'viewType' cookie value by setting up the toggle 
buttons and calling the 'createViewType' function with the
proper parameter value.
classitems.name: initViewType

classitems.description:
This function runs after changing the view type.
First, it checks whether it is really a change or
the same as the current one. If it has to be changed,
it calls the toggle functions, sets the cookie value
and fires a search using the current search term.
classitems.name: toggleViewType

classitems.description:
This function initializes every components after changing 
view type. It creates both panels and draggers.
classitems.name: createViewType

classitems.description:
This function handles view type toggling by calling the
toggle function with the proper parameter.
classitems.name: onViewTypeToggle

classitems.description:
This function destroys every components of the current view type
in case it's not the same as the new view type.
classitems.name: destroyCurrentViewType

classitems.description:
This function initializes all the draggers that the page contains.
It uses jQuery 'draggable'.
classitems.name: initDraggers

classitems.description:
This function is called, when the user clicks on the login button.
It displays the login popup window.
classitems.name: login

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the logo.
It navigates to the Fusepool main site.
classitems.name: clickLogo

classitems.description:
This function processes GET parameters. If it finds 'search' or
'entity', it fires a search and open the document if there is the
'openPreview' parameter.
classitems.name: processGETParameters

classitems.description:
This function calculates the position of the previewed document
and opens the document on the right.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: docURI
params.description: the URI of the clicked document

params.name: inEvent
params.description: mouse over on a short document event

classitems.description: This function queries the Annostore for a single annotation - only for testing purposes.
classitems.name: getAnnotation

classitems.description:
This function creates and saves a bookmark, which contains the
search word, the unchecked entities and the opened document.
classitems.name: createBookmark

classitems.description: This function shows a message in a popup.
classitems.name: popupBookmark

classitems.description:
This function calculates the position of the popup to be 
displayed horizontally in the center, vertically on the top.
classitems.name: changeBMPopupPosition

classitems.description:
This function is called when the screen size is changing.
This function calls the bookmark popup changer function and the
preview box size changer function.
classitems.name: resizeHandler

classitems.description:
This function reduces the preview box height if there isn't enough
place for that. It sets the default height for the box otherwise.
classitems.name: changePreviewBoxSize

classitems.description: This function calls the ajax search if the search word is not empty.
classitems.name: search

params.name: checkedEntities
params.description: the checked entities on the left side

classitems.description: This function sends an ajax request for searching.
classitems.name: sendSearchRequest

params.name: checkedEntities
params.description: the checked entities on the left side

params.name: responseFunction
params.description: the name of the response function

params.name: offset
params.description: the offset of the documents (e.g. offset = 10 --> documents in 10-20)

classitems.description: This function creates the search URL for the query.
classitems.name: createSearchURL

classitems.description: This function sends a request for more documents.
classitems.name: moreDocuments

params.name: offset
params.description: the offset of the document (e.g. offset = 10 -> documents 10-20)

classitems.description:
This function runs after the ajax more search is done.
This function calls the document updater function.
classitems.name: processMoreResponse

classitems.description:
This function creates a URL fraction that represents
the checked entities.
classitems.name: getCheckedEntitiesURL

classitems.description:
This function runs after the ajax search is done. It calls
the entity list updater and the document updater functions.
classitems.name: processSearchResponse

classitems.description: This function is called after a successful classification.
classitems.name: processClassifyResponse

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf response of the request

classitems.description:
This function updates the document list after classification
to have the correct order.
classitems.name: updateClassifiedDocList

classitems.description: This function creates a document list after classification.
classitems.name: createClassifiedDocList

classitems.description:
This function groups and sorts the entities and updates
the entity list on the left side.
classitems.name: updateEntityList

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf object which contains the new entity list

classitems.description: This function searches for dictionary categories in an rdf object.
classitems.name: getEntities

return.description: the categories array with the entities

classitems.description: This function searches for dictionary categories in an rdf object.
classitems.name: getCheckedEntities

return.description: the categories array with the entities

classitems.description: This function returns an array of type facets found in an RDF object.
classitems.name: getTypeFacets

params.name: rdf
params.description: the RDF object which contains the type facets

classitems.description: This function returns an array of facets found in an RDF object.
classitems.name: getFacets

params.name: rdf
params.description: the RDF object which contains the facets

classitems.description:
This function searches for the checked entities in an RDF object and
returns them.
classitems.name: checkedEntitiesFromRdf

classitems.description:
This function searches for the checked entities in an RDF object and
returns them.
classitems.name: checkedTypeFacetsFromRdf

classitems.description: This function decides whether an entity list contains an entity or not.
classitems.name: containsEntity

return.description: true, if the list contains the entity, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function deletes every entity from an array that equals
a given entity (after a given index).
classitems.name: deteleLaterEntities

params.name: fromIndex
params.description: the start index in the array

classitems.description: This function updates the document list in the middle.
classitems.name: updateDocumentList

params.name: rdf
params.description: the RDF object which contains the new document list

classitems.description: This function deletes the content from the Preview panel.
classitems.name: cleanPreviewBox

classitems.description: This function deletes the content from the Details panel.
classitems.name: cleanDetailsBox

classitems.description: This function searches for the count of documents in an rdf object.
classitems.name: getDocumentsCount

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf object, which contains the count of documents.

classitems.description: This function creates an ordered list of documents from an rdf object.
classitems.name: createDocumentList

classitems.description:
This function decides whether a document list contains
a document with a specific content and title or not.
classitems.name: containsDocument

return.description: true, if the list contains, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function calls the content updater function of the
details box.
[replaced with function 'displayDetails']
classitems.name: updateDetails

classitems.description:
This function calls the display function of the
details box.
classitems.name: displayDetails

params.name: rdf
params.description: rdf with the metadata of the entity

classitems.description: This function initializes the login panel based on the cookie values.
classitems.name: initLogin

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on 'Sign out'.
It hides and shows the proper panels and sets the cookie value.
classitems.name: signOut

classitems.description:
This function is called when the tap the 'Back' button on the registration
popup hide the registration's components and shows the login's componens.
classitems.name: back

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks on 'Sign In'. It starts
a request to the server and based on the response, it either
calls the 'signInFailed' or the 'signInSucceed' function.
classitems.name: signIn

classitems.description:
This function runs after a successful login. It creates the proper
cookie and sets the login panel to logged in state.
classitems.name: signInSucceed

classitems.description: This function runs after an unsuccessful login. It shows an error message.
classitems.name: signInFailed

classitems.description:
This function called when the tap the "Sign Up" button. If the registration
panel is active, the ajax request will be sent in the future, otherwise
it shows the registration's fields.
classitems.name: signUp

classitems.description:
This function runs after an unsuccessful registration.
It shows an error message.
classitems.name: registrationFailed

classitems.description:
This function runs after a successful registration.
It switches back the panel to login state and informs
the user about the successful registration.
classitems.name: registrationSucceed

classitems.description:
This function validates the entered data in the fields
of the registration panel.
classitems.name: validateFields

classitems.description: This function clears and hides the 'currentUserLabel' panel.
classitems.name: hideCurrentUser

classitems.description:
This function displays a text in the 'currentUserLabel' panel
(either a username or a message about being logged out).
classitems.name: showCurrentUser

classitems.description: This function hides the current message in the panel.
classitems.name: hideLoginMessage

classitems.description: This function shows a message.
classitems.name: showLoginMessage

classitems.description:
This function calls the 'signIn' function when the user
presses Enter in the login panel.
classitems.name: onKeydown

classitems.description: This function shows all fields of the registration.
classitems.name: showRegisterFields

classitems.description: This function shows the login panel.
classitems.name: showLogin

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks out of the popup or to the close
button. It hides the whole popup.
classitems.name: close

classitems.description:
This function creates the entity menu, which is being displayed when the user
highlights a text in the preview document and right clicks.
classitems.name: createMenu

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user push the "Add entity" menu
item. The addEntityPopup will be showed with the selected text.
classitems.name: addEntity

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the 'Remove entity' menu
item. The 'removeEntityPopup' will be displayed with the selected text.
classitems.name: removeEntity

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks on the 'Move entity' menu
item. The 'moveEntityPopup' will be displayed with the selected text.
classitems.name: moveEntity

classitems.description: This function displays the entity menu at mouse position.
classitems.name: showMenu

params.name: inEvent
params.description: the event which contains the position of the mouse

params.name: selectedText
params.description: the selected text what the user selected

classitems.description: This function hides the entity menu.
classitems.name: hideMenu

classitems.description: This function changes the height of the opened document.
classitems.name: changeHeight

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks on the previewed document. If the
popup menu exists, the user clicked with right button, and the
selected text length's is sufficient the entity menu is getting displayed.
If the user clicks with any other mouse button (and the menu exists),
the entity menu will be hidden.
classitems.name: clickText

params.name: inEvent
params.description: the event which contains information about the mouse

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks the 'positive rate' button. It shows
the rating popup with true (positive) parameter.
[This functionality is currently unused.]
classitems.name: positiveRate

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks the 'Negative rate' button. It shows
the rating popup with false (negative) parameter.
[This functionality is currently unused.]
classitems.name: negativeRate

classitems.description: This function runs when the user clicks the 'Full view' button.
classitems.name: fullView

classitems.description:
This function hides the positive and negative rate buttons and the full
view button.
classitems.name: hideRateButtons

classitems.description:
This function shows the positive and negative rate buttons and the full
view button. 
[This functionality is currently unused.]
classitems.name: showRateButtons

classitems.description:
This function calls 'openDoc' function of the opened document
and displays the buttons.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: docURI
params.description: URI of the document to be opened

classitems.description: This function cleans the content of the opened document.
classitems.name: clean

classitems.description: This function returns the generated ID of the opened document panel.
classitems.name: getOpenDocId

classitems.description: This function returns the URI of the opened document.
classitems.name: getDocumentURI

classitems.description: In the beginning this message box is not visible.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This function updates the content in the message box.
classitems.name: updateMessage

classitems.description: This function closes the top message box.
classitems.name: close

classitems.description: This function returns the unchecked entities of the dictionaries.
classitems.name: getUncheckedEntities

classitems.description: This function shows the 'Documents' button in the mobile version.
classitems.name: showDocsButton

classitems.description: This function hides the 'Documents' button in the mobile version.
classitems.name: hideDocsButton

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user presses the 'Documents' button.
It calls the parent function which slides the Documents panel.
classitems.name: searchShow

classitems.description: This function updates the dictionary list from a dictionary object.
classitems.name: updateDictionaries

classitems.description:
This function calls the content updater function of the Details box.
[replaced with function 'displayDetails']
classitems.name: updateDetails

classitems.description: This function calls the content updater function of the Details box.
classitems.name: displayDetails

params.name: rdf
params.description: rdf with the metadata of the entity

classitems.description:
This function calls the parent's search function with the search
word and the checked entity list.
classitems.name: search

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user starts a search. It calls the document
list's startSearching function.
classitems.name: startSearching

classitems.description: This function calls the parent's create bookmark function.
classitems.name: createBookmark

classitems.description:
This function calls the bookmark's save bookmark function
with an URL and a title.
classitems.name: saveBookmark

classitems.description:
This function calls the parent's function, which shows a
message about the bookmark in a new popup.
classitems.name: popupBookmark

classitems.description:
This function shows the 'Entities' button that navigates
to the entity list panel.
classitems.name: showEntitiesButton

classitems.description: This function hides the 'Entities' button.
classitems.name: hideEntitiesButton

classitems.description: This function calls the parent's entity show function.
classitems.name: entityShow

classitems.description: This function calls the parent's user interface update function.
classitems.name: updateUI

classitems.description: This function calls the document list's update function.
classitems.name: updateDocuments

classitems.description:
This function calls the documents' addMoreDocuments
function with the new documents.
classitems.name: addMoreDocuments

classitems.description: This function calls the parent's moreDocuments function.
classitems.name: moreDocuments

classitems.description: This function calls the parent's openDoc function with the document URI.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: documentURI
params.description: URI of the document to be opened

classitems.description: This function updates the text in the search field.
classitems.name: updateInput

classitems.description: This function updates the counter with a given value.
classitems.name: updateCounts

classitems.description:
This function shows the rate popup with true (positive) parameter.
[Currently unused.]
classitems.name: positiveRate

classitems.description:
This function shows the rate popup with false (negative) parameter.
[Currently unused.]
classitems.name: negativeRate

classitems.description:
This function opens a document in full view.
[Currently unused.]
classitems.name: fullView

classitems.description: This function shows the 'Back' button.
classitems.name: showBackButton

classitems.description: This function hides the 'Back' button.
classitems.name: hideBackButton

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user push the 'Back' button.
It calls the parent's function, which closes this panel.
classitems.name: back

classitems.description:
This function calls the opened document's document opening
function with the document's URI.
classitems.name: openDoc

classitems.description: This functions hides the preview panel.
classitems.name: clean

classitems.description: This function returns the URI of the opened document.
classitems.name: getDocumentURI

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks the 'Add' button.
It shows the add entity popup with the selected text.
classitems.name: addEntity

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks the 'Move' button.
It shows the move entity popup with the selected text.
classitems.name: moveEntity

classitems.description:
This function is called when the user clicks the 'Remove' button.
It shows the remove entity popup with the selected text.
classitems.name: removeEntity

classitems.description:
This function processes GET parameters. If it finds 'search' or
'entity', it fires a search and open the document if there is the
'openPreview' parameter.
classitems.name: processGETParameters

classitems.description: This function returns whether the window width is mobile size or not.
classitems.name: isMobileSize

return.description: true, if the screen size is maximum 800 pixels, otherwise false

classitems.description: This function shows the middle panel.
classitems.name: searchShow

classitems.description: This function shows the left panel.
classitems.name: entityShow

classitems.description:
This function opens a document in the preview panel.
If the screen size is small, it shows the right panel only.
classitems.name: openDoc

params.name: documentURI
params.description: the document URI to be opened

classitems.description:
This function updates the 'open' buttons (e.g. the
'entities button' in the middle).
classitems.name: updateButtons

classitems.description:
This function is called when the screen size is changing or
the user rotates the device. This function sets the actual panel
according to the screen size, updates the buttons, and changes
the position of the bookmark popup.
classitems.name: reflow

classitems.description:
This function creates and saves a bookmark. It contains the
search word, the unchecked entities and the opened document.
classitems.name: createBookmark

classitems.description: This function shows a message in the bookmark popup.
classitems.name: popupBookmark

params.name: message
params.description: the message what the function shows

classitems.description:
This function calculates the position of the popup to be 
displayed in the middle of the screen.
classitems.name: changeBMPopupPosition

classitems.description: This function calls the ajax search if the search word is not empty.
classitems.name: search

params.name: checkedEntities
params.description: the unchecked entities on the left side

classitems.description: This function sends an ajax request for searching.
classitems.name: sendSearchRequest

params.name: checkedEntities
params.description: the checked entities on the left side

params.name: responseFunction
params.description: the name of the response function

params.name: offset
params.description: the offset of the documents (e.g. offset = 10 --> documents in 10-20)

classitems.description: This function creates the search URL for the query.
classitems.name: createSearchURL

classitems.description: This function send a request for more documents.
classitems.name: moreDocuments

classitems.description:
This function runs after getting the response from the ajax
more search. It calls the document updater function.
classitems.name: processMoreResponse

params.name: success
params.description: the search query was success or not

classitems.description:
This function creates a URL fraction that represents
the checked entities.
classitems.name: getCheckedEntitiesURL

classitems.description:
This function runs after the ajax search is getting finished.
It calls the entity list updater and the document updater functions.
classitems.name: processSearchResponse

classitems.description:
This function groups and sorts the entities and updates
the entity list on the left side.
classitems.name: updateEntityList

classitems.description: This function searches for dictionary categories in an rdf object.
classitems.name: getCategories

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf object that contains the categories

return.description: the categories array with the entities

classitems.description:
This function searches for the checked entities in an rdf object
and returns the array of it.
classitems.name: checkedEntitiesFromRdf

classitems.description: This function decides whether an entity list contains an entity or not.
classitems.name: containsEntity

return.description: true if the list contains the entity, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function deletes every entity from an array that equals
a given entity (after a given index).
classitems.name: deteleLaterEntities

params.name: fromIndex
params.description: the start index in the array

classitems.description: This function updates the document list in the middle.
classitems.name: updateDocumentList

params.name: rdf
params.description: the rdf object that contains the new document list

classitems.description: This function deletes the content from the preview panel.
classitems.name: cleanPreviewBox

classitems.description: This function returns the count of documents in an rdf object.
classitems.name: getDocumentsCount

classitems.description: This function creates an ordered document list from the rdf object.
classitems.name: createDocumentList

classitems.description:
This function decides whether a document list contains
a document with a specific content and title or not.
classitems.name: containsDocument

return.description: true, if the list contains, false otherwise

classitems.description:
Creating function which sets the input and the suggester div css class
and hides the suggest div.
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: This functions runs after rendering.
classitems.name: rendered

classitems.description:
This function update the back input field after the rendering. If the user
focus on the back input, the program set the focus to the front input.
It requires jQuery.
classitems.name: updateBackInput

classitems.description: This function updates the input field's placeholder.
classitems.name: updatePlaceholder

classitems.description: This function put a new text to the input.
classitems.name: updateInputValue

classitems.description:
This function sends a request to the back-end to get the suggestion list
for the keyword.
classitems.name: refreshFromBackend

classitems.description: This function processes the response after the ajax request.
classitems.name: processResponse

params.name: inResponse
params.description: the response what is come from the back-end

classitems.description:
This function parses an rdf text to a string array,
which contains the suggested elements.
classitems.name: rdfToArray

params.name: response
params.description: the rdf response from the back-end

classitems.description:
This function generates the post body text for the ajax request. The postBody
contains the input text and the number of max elements. The table name and
the 'where' property is optional.
classitems.name: generatePostBodyText

classitems.description:
This function returns the format for the request. The possible
formats are 'json' and 'rdf'. Otherwise it returns 'json'.
classitems.name: generateRequestFormat

classitems.description:
This function returns the header for the request.
It is important for rdf formatted requests. The default is null.
classitems.name: generateHeader

classitems.description:
This function deletes the content from the input field and
hides the suggestion list.
classitems.name: clearText

classitems.description: This function returns the input field's value.
classitems.name: getText

classitems.description: This function disables the input field.
classitems.name: disableInput

classitems.description: This function enables the input field.
classitems.name: enableInput

classitems.description: This function returns true if the parameter is empty, false otherwise.
classitems.name: isEmptyParam

params.name: parameter
params.description: the text what the function check

return.description: true if the parameter is empty, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user presses a key while 
the suggestion list is active. The used keys are
up, down, Enter and ESC.
classitems.name: keyDown

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user changes the input field's content, and
controls the autosuggest event.
classitems.name: keyUp

params.name: inEvent
params.description: the input change event which contains the pressed button

classitems.description:
This function run, when the user push the 'up arrow' button on
the keyboard. The function step down up the suggestion list, and
update the input field text to the selected item.
classitems.name: moveUp

classitems.description:
This function run, when the user push the 'down arrow' button on
the keyboard. The function step down on the suggestion list, and
update the input field text to the selected item.
classitems.name: moveDown

classitems.description:
This function adds a new item to the suggestion list. The item contains the input
text, and these characters will be bold in the user interface.
classitems.name: addSuggestElement

params.name: inputText
params.description: the content of the input field

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user moves the mouse over a suggested element.
It selects the related element in the list.
classitems.name: mouseOver

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user moves the mouse out of a suggested element.
It deselects the related element in the list.
classitems.name: mouseOut

classitems.description:
This function updates the input field and hides the suggestion list
when the user clicks on an item.
classitems.name: mouseDown

classitems.description:
This function controls the filtering of the data list and creates the
suggestion list.
classitems.name: onTextChange

classitems.description: This function clears the second input in the background.
classitems.name: clearBackInput

classitems.description:
This function puts the suggested word into the background input so it
looks like the suggester continues the term that the user started to type.
It handles case-differences between the suggested term and the term that
the user entered.
classitems.name: completeBackInput

params.name: word
params.description: the word what the function puts

classitems.description:
This function checks that which elements are matched to the input field's
content. It can use both global data and own data. This function is used when
the there are no refreshing from back-end.
classitems.name: getMatches

params.name: list
params.description: the created filtered list which is returned by the function

classitems.description:
This function checks whether the first parameter contains the second. If the
'wordStartingMatching' variable is true, the function checks the beginning of
the word, everywhere in the word otherwise.
classitems.name: containsText

params.name: longText
params.description: the longText which may contains the searchedText

return.description: true, if the longText contains the searchedText, false otherwise

classitems.description:
This function runs, when the user leaves the input field.
It hides the suggestion list and clears the input field in
the background too.
classitems.name: onBlurInput

classitems.description: This function hides the suggestion list.
classitems.name: hideSuggest

classitems.description: This function shows the suggestion list.
classitems.name: showSuggest

classitems.description: This function sets the width of the popup window.
classitems.name: updateWidth

params.name: margin
params.description: left and right margin in pixels

classitems.description: This function returns the content in the popup window.
classitems.name: getContent

classitems.description: This function sets the content and opens the popup window.
classitems.name: setContent

classitems.description: This function shows the popup and the close button.
classitems.name: open

classitems.description:
This function runs when the user clicks out of the popup or on the close
button. It hides the popup window.
classitems.name: close

classitems.description: Register helper to show content of a rdf source

This function queries the platform for the current, logged in user
and sets the currentUser cookie value.
classitems.name: setCurrentUser

classitems.description: This function creates a cookie using the parameter values.
classitems.name: createCookie

classitems.description: This function returns a cookie.
classitems.name: readCookie

classitems.description: This function deletes a cookie.
classitems.name: eraseCookie

classitems.description: Checks whether the data is empty or not.
classitems.name: isEmpty

params.name: data
params.description: the data what the function checks

return.description: true, if data is empty, false, if data is not empty

classitems.description:
This function formats the given string and clears the html tags
that could cause trouble on the GUI. It is using jquery-clean jQuery plug-in.
classitems.name: removeTags

classitems.description:
This function checks whether the length of a given text is between
a minimum and a maximum value.
classitems.name: textLengthBetween

return.description:
true, if the text's length is greater or equals the minimum length
and shorter or equals the maximum length

classitems.description:
This function gets a parameter name and returns an array that contain every
value that can be found in the GET variables under this parameter name.
For example when the URL contains x=1&x=2, the result array will be [1,2].
classitems.name: GetURLParameter

params.name: paramName
params.description: the name of the GET parameter

return.description: the result array (empty if the parameter does not exist)

classitems.description: This function replaces every occurences of a string with another string.
classitems.name: replaceAll

return.description: if the text is not empty, the replaced text with trim, else an empty text

classitems.description:
This function replaces every occurences of a string with another string 
between 'startTag' and 'endTag'.
classitems.name: replaceAllInTags

params.name: startTag
params.description: the start character of the replacing

return.description: if the text is not empty, the replaced text with trim, else an empty text

classitems.description: Delete speech marks (") from the first and last character of a text.
classitems.name: deleteSpeechMarks

params.name: text
params.description: the text what the function check

classitems.description: This functions returns a property's value from an rdf object using RDFStore.
classitems.name: getRDFPropertyValue

classitems.description:
This function gets an rdf object, an existing subject and an exclude array 
and gives back a value from a random property that has been found in the rdf
connected to the given subject and does not exist in the exclude array.
classitems.name: getAPropertyValue

return.description: the value of a found property

classitems.description: This function places an annotation in the Annostore.
classitems.name: sendAnnotation

classitems.description:
This function cuts the given string at the given length
if the string is longer than this length, adds an ellipsis 
character to the end, then returns the new string.
classitems.name: cutStr

classitems.description:
This function queries the server for the user's own labels
and places them in a cookie.
classitems.name: getUserLabels

warnings.message:
Missing item type
Register helper to show content of a rdf source
